before.name: wikispeech_utterance
before.comment: Keeps track of utterances, text segments as spoken voice, in extension Wikispeech.

columns.name: wsu_utterance_id
columns.comment: Primary key. Also used as the file name prefix of the stored utterance audio and metadata.

columns.name: wsu_remote_wiki_hash
columns.comment: Gadget consumer URL (remote wiki) hash, or null if local. SHA256 as lower case HEX string.

columns.name: wsu_page_id
columns.comment: page.page_id containing the text segment the utterance represents.

columns.name: wsu_seg_hash
columns.comment: Hash of text segment represented as synthesized utterance. SHA256 as lower case HEX string.

columns.name: wsu_voice
columns.comment: Name of voice used in utterance.

columns.name: wsu_date_stored
columns.comment: Timestamp of when the utterance was stored in database. Used to flush out old utterances on update.

indexes.name: get_utterance
indexes.comment: Used when fetching a specific utterance in a page.

indexes.name: expire_page_utterances
indexes.comment: Used to flush all utterances for a given page.

indexes.name: expire_utterances_lang
indexes.comment: Used to flush all utterances for a specific language due to improvements of synthesis.

indexes.name: expire_utterances_lang_voice
indexes.comment: Used to flush all utterances for a specific language in a specific voice due to improvements of synthesis.

indexes.name: expire_utterances_ttl
indexes.comment: Used to automatically flush utterances that are older than the time-to-live setting.
